title: Minnesota shooting suspect and wife were ‘preppers,’ FBI affidavit says - The Washington Post
summary: The article discusses the case of Vance Boelter, charged with the fatal shooting of a Minnesota state lawmaker and her husband, and reveals that Boelter and his wife were 'preppers' according to an FBI affidavit.
timeline: 2025-06-21: Minnesota lawmaker and husband fatally shot.
2025-06-21: Vance Boelter charged with the killings.
2025-06-21: FBI affidavit reveals Boelter and wife were 'preppers'.
why_matters: The case highlights concerns about extremism and preparedness subcultures in the context of violent crimes.
